price: Na hakika tulimtuma Musa pamoja na Ishara zetu na uthibitisho ulio wazi
arabic: وَلَقَدۡ أَرۡسَلۡنَا مُوسَىٰ بِـَٔايَٰتِنَا وَسُلۡطَٰنٖ مُّبِينٍ
footnotes: Na hakika tulimtuma Musa na tukamuunga mkono kwa miujiza yenye kuonyesha ukweli wake, na uthibitisho ulio wazi wenye nguvu juu ya nafsi.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: walaqad arsalnā mūsā biāyātinā wasul'ṭānin mubīnin
